Package com.sun.faces.renderkit

Class ClientSideStateHelper.StringBuilderWriter

java.lang.Object
java.io.Writer
com.sun.faces.renderkit.ClientSideStateHelper.StringBuilderWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable
Enclosing class:
ClientSideStateHelper
protected static final class ClientSideStateHelper.StringBuilderWriter extends Writer
A simple Writer implementation to encapsulate a StringBuilder instance.
